description: No social distancing rules allowed 500 people to safely enjoy the church service on the Isle of Man.
title: Covid-19: Isle of Man church packed for zero-distanced carol service
title_page: Covid-19: Isle of Man church packed for zero-distanced carol service - BBC News
maintext: "We need to just be grateful for that, to make the most of what we have, while also remembering all of those people who can't be in that position," he added.
